name: Happy Pop Mania
description:
Happy Pop Mania is a very casual and addictive line match game, develop your intelligence, challenge your limits.
Delicious candy jelly icecream and colorful levels, connecting the same Happy Pop, so the cartoon splashing, simply can not stop.
How to play:
1, line three or more servings of Happy Pop to splash
2, complete the level target within the time prescribed or steps
3, eliminate more Happy Pop can get special props
4, try to use special props to help clearance
Features:
1, fine screen
2, 100 levels of fun
3, a variety of special props provided
